Posts.Content: What a palaver just to reply to one thread. I'd not joined before as nothing really to add BUT as far as frostbitten ears are concerned I found the solution!!!! Cotton wool or gauze don't work but get hold ofÂ a jiffy bag and cut the corners off to make 2 triangles of bubble wrap. Open them out and place over your eartips. Instant relief from the cold. I'd also go with a hot drink during the first 10 to15 minutes whilst it goes numb. My daughter helped to distracted me with a card game -critical illness top trumps!!!!! It does exist, honest. Bit of black humour but it worked
Posts.Title: Cold Cap Experience
